intro: An unusual Trainer with sky-gear blocks your way!
intro_f: An unusual Trainer with sky-gear blocks your way!
intro_dialogue: Hey! Care for a Sky Battle with a Sky Trainer?
intro_dialogue_f: Hey! Care for a Sky Battle with a Sky Trainer?
title: Sky Battle!
speaker: Sky Trainer
description:
The Trainer is waiting for a response…
In this battle, only pokémon able to stay above the ground can battle. Moves that require surronding water or ground are disabled
Show them your superior Flying Pokémon!
description_f:
The Trainer is waiting for a response…
In this battle, only pokémon able to stay above the ground can battle. Moves that require surronding water or ground are disabled
Show them your superior Flying Pokémon!

1.label: Accept the Battle
1.tooltip:
(-) Hard or Tough Battle
(+) Move Rewards
Ineligeble moves are removed. Restored after Battle.

2.label: Flaunt Your Flying Pokémon
2.disabled_tooltip: You need at least 3 Flying Pokémon on your team to select this.
2.selected: You proudly send out all your Flying Pokémon…$The Trainer is impressed, but disappointed you didn’t just battle them.
2.selected_f: You proudly send out all your Flying Pokémon…$The Trainer is impressed, but disappointed you didn’t just battle them.

3.label: Leave battle
3.selected: Guess you chicken’d out, huh? You must fly as much as an ostrich.
3.selected_f: Guess you chicken’d out, huh? You must fly as much as an ostrich.

battle_won:
Well, this is a bit disappointing for a Sky Trainer like me…
You’re no penguin!$In exchange for the valuable lesson,
allow me to teach one of your Pokémon a Flying-type move!
battle_won_f:
Well, this is a bit disappointing for a Sky Trainer like me…
You’re no penguin!$In exchange for the valuable lesson,
allow me to teach one of your Pokémon a Flying-type move!
teach_move_prompt: Select a move to teach a Pokémon.
confirm_no_teach: You sure you don’t want to learn one of these great moves?
confirm_no_teach_f: You sure you don’t want to learn one of these great moves?
outro: May we meet again, high in the sky!
outro_f: May we meet again, high in the sky!
